kpi_info.title: SRB ACTIVE FAILURE OTHER
kpi_info.use: The number of abnormally released RRC connections with standalone signalling radio bearer before RAB assignment. UPDATED: When a standalone SRB is released due to some failure, i.e. when it is counted as RRC Active Failure in the old Service Level counters. The counter is updated when the establishment cause in RRC: RRC CONNECTION REQUEST is some other cause.
